name: DemonCountdown
description:
DemonCountdown is a Bullet Hell roguelike where hordes of demons lurk in waves of hell.

Slaughter all them and fill everything with blood and guts Before the night come to us.

Is a frenetic game where you´ll need Skill boost and your friends to play in online Coop mode.

Whatever kill a demon you get killpoint, and you can purchase skill boost ( only for a seconds ) or another Character…

The level of your skills can go up or down depending on the number of kill points.
The demons will come in waves of increasing difficulty.
Overcome each wave by reaching a minimum number of killpoints.

When night falls, you or one of your friends must have a minimum number of kill points to win.

Dying resets the kill counter to zero for that player and undoes any character purchases, and you spawn all time but time goes by…


Will you and your friends survive before nightfall? Before the night come to us?

Key Features:

-Online Coop
-Controller Support
-TopDown, TwinStickShooter
-Procedural Map, Every map is unique
-Frenetic Explosion and Gore: Blood and Guts and special Weapon to slaughter.
